faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: We solve your most frequent questions

faq_contact_desc: Contact us and we will reply as soon as possible.
faq_a1: It’s very simple. You book and pay entirely online through our website. Once the reservation is confirmed, you’ll receive a code that lets you enter the shop and open the locker you booked.
faq_q2: Can I book a locker in advance?
faq_a2: Yes, you can book ahead of time. We recommend reserving as early as possible, especially during peak season.
faq_q3: What happens if I pick up late?
faq_a3: If you go past the contracted time, we may charge an extension fee and collection might be postponed to the next opening slot. Let us know if you expect a delay.
faq_q4: Can I access my locker multiple times during the day?
faq_a4: Yes, you can access your locker as many times as you need during your booking using the code we provide.
faq_q5: Can I access several times during my booking?
faq_a5: Yes. You can open and close your locker as often as you need within the timetable.
faq_a6: Yes. The premises have 24/7 CCTV, code access and metal lockers. Codes are automatically refreshed after each use.
faq_q7: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_a7: Payment is card-only through a secure gateway.
faq_a8: Payment is completely secure and processed with a credit card when you confirm the booking.
faq_q9: I lost the code / my phone ran out of battery
faq_a9: Contact us. After verifying your identity we’ll help you regain access.

banner.title: Your cookie preferences
banner.body: We use essential cookies to keep the site running and optional analytics to improve your experience. You can accept only the necessary ones or all of them.

modal.title: Cookie preferences
modal.body: You can turn analytics cookies on or off at any time. Essential cookies are always enabled so the site works.

categories.essential_desc: Language, theme and core features required for Easy Locker to work.
categories.analytics_desc: They help us understand site usage and improve our services.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie policy
cookiePolicy.summary: This policy explains how Easy Locker uses cookies to deliver the service, improve the experience and measure the site's performance anonymously.

responsible.title: 1. Who is the controller?
responsible.body: Easy Locker Cordoba ("Easy Locker") is responsible for processing the data related to cookie usage on this website.

list.purpose: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide our services, improve the user experience and obtain anonymous usage statistics.

responsible.note: If you need the full company details or further information, contact us at info@easy-locker.com.

definition.title: 2. What are cookies?
definition.body: A cookie is a small file stored in your browser that helps remember preferences or understand how you use the site. Cookies can be first-party (easy-locker.com) or third-party (e.g., Google) and may be session-based or persistent.

essential.title: 3.1 Essential cookies (required)
essential.intro: They are required for the website to work properly and can't be disabled from the banner.

items.consent: Store your choice about cookie usage.

essential.legal: Legal basis: legitimate interest and provision of the service (without them the site would break).

analytics.title: 3.2 Analytics cookies (optional)
analytics.intro: We use Google Analytics / Firebase Analytics to know how many visits we receive, which sections are used the most and how to improve performance.

dataItems.device: Anonymous identifier of the device or browser.
dataItems.tech: Basic technical information (browser, resolution, approximate country, etc.).
dataItems.usage: Usage information (pages visited, time on each section, events such as "Book now" clicks or language changes).

notStoredItems.contact: Email, phone numbers or payment data.
notStoredItems.booking: Booking codes or other data that directly identifies you.

analytics.legal: Legal basis: your consent, which you can grant or withdraw in the banner or via "Manage cookies" in the footer. Provider: Google LLC (USA), applying the relevant Standard Contractual Clauses.

list.title: 4. Specific cookies

easyConsent.purpose: Stores whether you accepted or rejected analytics cookies.

ga.purpose: Measures visits and usage once you consent.

list.notice: We periodically review the cookies we use and update this table whenever we add or remove tools.

manage.title: 5. How can I manage or withdraw consent?
manage.body: The first time you visit we show a banner so you can accept only essential cookies or all of them. You can change your choice at any time through the "Manage cookies" link in the footer. If you disable analytics we stop sending events to Google/Firebase and stop reading previously set cookies.

transfer.title: 6. International transfers
transfer.body: Using Google/Firebase may involve data transfers to the United States. Google LLC states that it applies Standard Contractual Clauses and additional safeguards according to EU law.

updates.title: 7. Updates to this policy
updates.body: We may update this policy to reflect legal or technical changes. When the change is relevant we will ask for your consent again through the cookie banner.
